    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        public Connection(java.lang.String clientHandle,
                  java.lang.String clientId,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  int port,
                  android.content.Context context,
                  MqttAndroidClient client,
                  boolean sslConnection)
        Creates a connection object with the server information and the client hand which is the reference used to pass the client around activities
        Parameters:
        clientHandle - The handle to this Connection object
        clientId - The Id of the client
        host - The server which the client is connecting to
        port - The port on the server which the client will attempt to connect to
        context - The application context
        client - The MqttAndroidClient which communicates with the service for this connection
        sslConnection - true if the connection is secured by SSL

    • Method Detail

      • createConnection

        public static Connection createConnection(java.lang.String clientId,
                                          java.lang.String host,
                                          int port,
                                          android.content.Context context,
                                          boolean sslConnection)
        Creates a connection from persisted information in the database store, attempting to create a MqttAndroidClient and the client handle.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The id of the client
        host - the server which the client is connecting to
        port - the port on the server which the client will attempt to connect to
        context - the application context
        sslConnection - true if the connection is secured by SSL
        Returns:
        a new instance of Connection
